Description_lang: Increases your dodge chance by ${$s1/2}% for $d.$?a344363[ Dodging an attack while Evasion is active will trigger Mastery: Main Gauche.][]
AuraDescription_lang: Dodge chance increased by ${$w1/2}%.$?a344363[ Dodging an attack while Evasion is active will trigger Mastery: Main Gauche.][]$?a457034[ Magical damage taken reduced by $w3%.][]

description_blz.en_US: Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta la probabilidad de esquivar un 100% durante 10 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta em 100% a sua chance de esquiva por 10 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht Eure Ausweichchance 10 Sek. lang um 100%.
description_blz.en_GB: Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Aumenta un 100% tu probabilidad de esquivar durante 10 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente vos chances d’esquiver de 100% pendant 10 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta la probabilità di schivata del 100% per 10 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: На 10 сек. повышает вероятность уклонения на 100%.
description_blz.zh_TW: 你的閃躲機率提高100%，持續10秒。
